<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_801257_ets_trans.EAPStoryAutoCreate</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>EAPStoryAutoCreate</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility Script Include for EAP Story Auto-Creation
 * Works for SC Task and Incident records
 * 
 * USAGE:
 *   - isAssignmentGroupEligible(current)  // Check if assignment group is eligible
 *   - createEAPStory(current)             // Create EAP story from SC Task
 *   - createEAPStoryFromIncident(current) // Create EAP story from Incident
 */
var EAPStoryAutoCreate = Class.create();
EAPStoryAutoCreate.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
        this.GROUP_BACKLOG_MAPPING_PROPERTY = 'x_801257_ets_trans.eap.story.auto_create.group_backlog_mapping';
    },



    /**
     * Check if assignment group is eligible for auto-creation
     */
    isAssignmentGroupEligible: function(record) {
    if (!record || !record.isValidRecord()) {
        this._log('Invalid record provided - returning false');
        return false;
    }

    var assignmentGroupSysId = record.assignment_group.toString();
    var catalogItemSysId = record.cat_item ? record.cat_item.toString() : null;

    this._log('Checking eligibility for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);

    var groupConfig = this._getGroupConfiguration(assignmentGroupSysId);
    if (!groupConfig) {
        this._log('Assignment group not configured for auto-creation: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
        return false;
    }

    // Only check catalog items if they exist and are defined in the config
    if (catalogItemSysId && groupConfig.catalog_items && groupConfig.catalog_items.length > 0) {
        var catalogItemMatch = groupConfig.catalog_items.indexOf(catalogItemSysId) !== -1;
        this._log('Catalog item match result: ' + catalogItemMatch);
        if (!catalogItemMatch) return false;
    }

    return true;
},


    /**
     * Get group configuration from system property
     */
    _getGroupConfiguration: function(assignmentGroupSysId) {
        this._log('Getting configuration for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);

        var mappingJson = gs.getProperty(this.GROUP_BACKLOG_MAPPING_PROPERTY, '');
        if (!mappingJson) {
            this._log('No group-backlog mapping configured');
            return null;
        }

        try {
            var mapping = JSON.parse(mappingJson);
            var groupConfig = mapping[assignmentGroupSysId];

            if (!groupConfig) {
                this._log('No configuration found for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
                return null;
            }

            // Handle legacy string format
            if (typeof groupConfig === 'string') {
                groupConfig = {
                    backlog_definition: groupConfig,
                    catalog_items: []
                };
            }

            return groupConfig;
        } catch (e) {
            this._log('Error parsing group-backlog mapping JSON: ' + e.message);
            return null;
        }
    },

    /**
     * Get backlog definition for assignment group
     */
    _getBacklogDefinitionForGroup: function(assignmentGroupSysId) {
        var groupConfig = this._getGroupConfiguration(assignmentGroupSysId);
        return groupConfig ? groupConfig.backlog_definition : '';
    },

    /**
     * Create EAP story from SC Task
     */
    createEAPStory: function(taskRecord) {
        if (!taskRecord || !taskRecord.isValidRecord()) {
            this._log('Invalid task record - cannot create story');
            return false;
        }

        var taskSysId = taskRecord.sys_id.toString();
        var assignmentGroupSysId = taskRecord.assignment_group.toString();
        var backlogDefinition = this._getBacklogDefinitionForGroup(assignmentGroupSysId);

        if (!backlogDefinition) {
            this._log('No backlog definition found for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
            return false;
        }

        try {
            var processor = new Agile_Multi_Task_AjaxProcessor();
            processor.request = {
                getParameter: function(name) {
                    var params = {
                        'sysparm_records': taskSysId,
                        'sysparm_table_name': 'sc_task',
                        'sysparm_backlog_definition': backlogDefinition
                    };
                    return params[name];
                }
            };

            var result = processor.addRecordsToBacklog();
            this._log('SC Task story creation result: ' + result);
            return result === 'true';
        } catch (e) {
            this._log('Error creating story from task: ' + e.message);
            return false;
        }
    },

    /**
     * Create EAP story from Incident
     */
    createEAPStoryFromIncident: function(incidentRecord) {
        if (!incidentRecord || !incidentRecord.isValidRecord()) {
            this._log('Invalid incident record - cannot create story');
            return false;
        }

        var incidentSysId = incidentRecord.sys_id.toString();
        var assignmentGroupSysId = incidentRecord.assignment_group.toString();
        var backlogDefinition = this._getBacklogDefinitionForGroup(assignmentGroupSysId);

        if (!backlogDefinition) {
            this._log('No backlog definition found for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
            return false;
        }

        try {
            var processor = new Agile_Multi_Task_AjaxProcessor();
            processor.request = {
                getParameter: function(name) {
                    var params = {
                        'sysparm_records': incidentSysId,
                        'sysparm_table_name': 'incident',
                        'sysparm_backlog_definition': backlogDefinition
                    };
                    return params[name];
                }
            };

            var result = processor.addRecordsToBacklog();
            this._log('Incident story creation result: ' + result);
            return result === 'true';
        } catch (e) {
            this._log('Error creating story from incident: ' + e.message);
            return false;
        }
    },

    type: 'EAPStoryAutoCreate'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-22 20:09:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>e2da8c1b938432107181f24efaba10e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EAPStoryAutoCreate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ETS Transformation" source="x_801257_ets_trans">34ca0c1b938432107181f24efaba101a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ETS Transformation">34ca0c1b938432107181f24efaba101a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e2da8c1b938432107181f24efaba10e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-22 20:25:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
